applicant-name.name: JIANGSU UNIV OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

invention-title: Energy-saving battery aluminum foil and preparation method thereof
一种节能电池铝箔及其制备方法

abstract.p: The invention provides an energy-saving battery aluminum foil and a preparation method thereof, and the preparation method comprises the following steps: smelting: smelting according to a 1235 alloy, and carrying out slag removal treatment by using a slag removal agent and a refining agent; the temperature of molten aluminum is controlled to be 700 DEG C +/-5 DEG C, modification treatment is added into a heat preservation furnace, aluminum-strontium alloy is added into the heat preservation furnace through electromagnetic stirring, refining is conducted once through a refining agent every 30 minutes, and then slagging-off treatment is conducted; hydrogen removal is conducted, specifically, argon is adopted as a hydrogen removal medium in a gas removal box, online hydrogen removal is conducted, and meanwhile Al-Ti-B-RE alloy wires are added into the gas removal box; cast rolling: carrying out cast rolling in a cast rolling machine; cold rolling is conducted, specifically, the cast-rolled plate is subjected to cold rolling; and heat treatment: carrying out heat treatment after cold rolling to 1.0 mm thickness, carrying out cold rolling to obtain a finished product, and carrying out corona treatment to obtain the energy-saving battery aluminum foil. The tensile strength of the energy-saving battery aluminum foil is larger than or equal to 256 MPa, the ductility is larger than or equal to 8%, the number of pinholes is smaller than or equal to 3/m < 2 >, the dyne value is larger than or equal to 34 dyn, and the energy-saving battery aluminum foil is high in strength, not prone to belt breakage and high in ductility.

本发明提供一种节能电池铝箔及其制备方法，包括以下步骤：熔炼：按照1235合金进行熔炼，用打渣剂、精炼剂进行打渣处理；保温：铝液温度控制在700℃±5℃，在保温炉中加入变质处理，变质处理是向保温炉中添加铝锶合金，并用电磁搅拌，每30分钟，用精炼剂精炼一次，然后进行扒渣处理；除氢：除气箱中采用氩气作为除氢介质，进行在线除氢，同时在除气箱中加入Al‑Ti‑B‑RE合金线材；铸轧：在铸轧机中进行铸轧；冷轧：将铸轧板进行冷轧；热处理：冷轧至1.0mm厚度进行热处理，冷轧至成品、电晕处理得到节能电池铝箔。所述节能电池铝箔的抗拉强度≥256MPa，延伸率≥8％，针孔数≤3个/m2，达因值≥34dyn，是一种强度高不容易断带和延伸率高的节能电池铝箔。
